OrgName: Shopify (USA) Inc. and Shopify Payments (USA) Inc.
activities: This certification applies to the following U.S. subsidiaries of Shopify Inc.: Shopify (USA) Inc. and Shopify Payments (USA) Inc. (together, the "Shopify Entities").  The Shopify Entities provide a variety of hosted ecommerce software and related online  services, including  payment processing and marketing. Personal information is processed for a variety of purposes related to the particular services provided. For example, the Shopify Entities use personal information to confirm user identity, process transactions, process payments, improve services, communicate with users, monitor and mitigate fraud risk, and to comply with applicable legal and regulatory requirements.  Personal information is transferred to third parties for limited purposes and in accordance with Shopify’s Privacy Policy.
contactoff1: Shopify (USA) Inc. and Shopify Payments (USA) Inc.
personaldata: All client, customer, partner and website visitor data. Data is both automatically and manually processed.
recoursemech: Data subjects are directed in Shopify's Privacy Policy to contact the Shopify Chief Privacy Officer at privacy@shopify.com.  If the data subject's complaint remains unresolved, data subjects are directed to contact the International Centre for Dispute Resolution®, the international division of the American Arbitration Association® (ICDR/AAA),  at http://info.adr.org/safeharbor/.
